titles.title: A bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to authorize the transfer of $20,000,000 in addition to U.S. War Reserve Stockpiles for Allies in Thailand to support the implementation of a bilateral agreement with Thailand.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S7516-7517)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 6/17/1993--Introduced. Amends the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to earmark funds for stockpiles in Thailand.
